cramped.translation[0].definitions[0].de: a cramped room, building etc does not have enough space for the people in it
cramped.translation[0].definitions[0].ex: The kitchen was small and cramped.
The troops slept in cramped conditions with up to 20 in a single room.
cramped.translation[0].definitions[1].de: unable to move properly and feeling uncomfortable because there is not enough space
cramped.translation[0].definitions[2].de: writing that is cramped is very small and difficult to read
